SEARCH
Package quest.flo

Klasse Database

java.lang.Object
quest.flo.Database
public class Database extends Object
Class that creates an object to abstract management of the database.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Database

      public Database(String url, String user, String password) throws SQLException
      Constructor for the Database object.
      Parameter:
      url - The url to use for the Connection, should not include the database.
      user - The user for accessing the database.
      password - The password for accessing the database.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If the connection to the dbms fails.

  • Methodendetails

    • use

      public void use(String name) throws SQLException
      Execute a "USE (database)" statement.
      Parameter:
      name - Name of the database to use.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If switching the database fails.

    • createDatabase

      public void createDatabase(String name) throws SQLException
      Create a database if it does not exist. Does not drop the database if it does exist.
      Parameter:
      name - Name of the database to create.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If creating the database fails.

    • createDatabase

      public void createDatabase(String name, boolean dropIfExists) throws SQLException
      Create a database if it does not exist. You can specify if it should first drop the database if it does exist.
      Parameter:
      name - Name of the database to create.
      dropIfExists - If the database should be dropped first.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If creating the database fails.

    • createTable

      public void createTable(String name, String[] cols) throws SQLException
      Create a table if it does not exist. Does not drop the table if it does exist.
      Parameter:
      name - Name of the table to create.
      cols - Array of columns to use to create the table.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If creating the table fails.

    • createTable

      public void createTable(String name, String[] cols, boolean dropIfExists) throws SQLException
      Create a table if it does not exist. You can specify if it should first drop the table if it does exist.
      Parameter:
      name - Name of the table to create.
      cols - Array of columns to use to create the table.
      dropIfExists - If the table should be dropped first.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If creating the table fails.

    • prepareStatement

      public PreparedStatement prepareStatement(String statement) throws SQLException
      Return a PreparedStatement so queries can be done.
      Parameter:
      statement - An SQL statement that can include parameter placeholders.
      Gibt zurück:
      The PreparedStatement with the pre-compiled SQL-Statement.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If preparing the Statement fails.

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection()
      Get the Connection to the database. For example: to use for methods directly on the Connection.
      Gibt zurück:
      The Connection to the Database.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect() throws SQLException
      Close the database connection.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If closing the database connection fails.
